Title: Halter Beaded Prom Evening Dress with Cut Out Back

----

----

Sizes: 10, 12, 8, 14, 4, 6

----

Colors: cayenne, mint

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: JC4100-mint-halter-beaded-prom-evening-dress-with-cut-out-back_p.jpg

----

Description: This chiffon gown is flowing and flirty. It has ruching across the bodice and waistline to create a bust, while the halter neckline is accented with rhinestones and extends into a plunging v on the bodice. The back of the dress has the same rhinestone beading that creates an open oval that wraps around the neck. Perfect for Bridesmaids or dances.
